fields.name: country_code
fields.description: The country where this institution is located, represented as an ISO two-letter country code.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The primary name of the institution.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for this institution.

fields.name: relationship
fields.description: The type of relationship between this institution and the listed institution. Possible values: parent, child, and related.

fields.name: ror
fields.description: The ROR ID for this institution. The ROR (Research Organization Registry) identifier is a globally unique ID for research organization. ROR is the successor to GRiD, which is no longer being updated.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The institution's primary type, using the ROR "type" controlled vocabulary. Possible values are: Education, Healthcare, Company, Archive, Nonprofit, Government, Facility, and Other.

name: cited_by_count
description: The total number Works that cite a work created by an author affiliated with this institution. Or less formally: the number of citations this institution has collected.

name: country_code
description: The country where this institution is located, represented as an ISO two-letter country code.

name: counts_by_year

fields.name: cited_by_count
fields.description: The total number Works that cite a work created by an author affiliated with this institution. Or less formally: the number of citations this institution has collected.

fields.name: works_count
fields.description: The number of Works created by authors affiliated with this institution. Or less formally: the number of works coming out of this institution.

fields.name: year
fields.description: The year.

description: works_count and cited_by_count for each of the last ten years, binned by year. To put it another way: each year, you can see how many new works this venue started hosting, and how many times any work in this venue got cited.

name: created_date
description: The date this Institution object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.

name: display_name
description: The primary name of the institution.

name: display_name_acronyms
description: Acronyms or initialisms that people sometimes use instead of the full display_name.

name: display_name_alternatives
description: Other names people may use for this institution.

name: geo

fields.name: city
fields.description: The city where this institution lives.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country where this institution lives.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: The country where this institution lives, represented as an ISO two-letter country code.

fields.name: geonames_city_id
fields.description: The city where this institution lives, as a GeoNames database ID.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Does what it says.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Does what it says.

fields.name: region
fields.description: The sub-national region (state, province) where this institution lives.

description: A bunch of stuff we know about the location of this institution:

name: homepage_url
description: The URL for institution's primary homepage

name: id
description: The OpenAlex ID for this institution.

name: ids

fields.name: grid
fields.description: this institution's GRID ID

fields.name: mag
fields.description: this institution's Microsoft Academic Graph ID

fields.name: openalex
fields.description: this institution's OpenAlex ID. Same as Institution.id

fields.name: ror
fields.description: this institution's ROR ID. Same as Institution.ror

fields.name: wikidata
fields.description: this institution's Wikidata ID

fields.name: wikipedia
fields.description: this institution's Wikipedia page URL

description: All the persistent identifiers (PIDs) that we know about for this institution, as key: value pairs, where key is the PID namespace, and value is the PID. IDs are expressed as URIs where possible. They're all strings except for mag, which is a long integer.

name: image_thumbnail_url
description: Same as image_url, but it's a smaller image.

name: image_url
description: URL where you can get an image representing this institution. Usually this is hosted on Wikipedia, and usually it's a seal or logo.

name: international

fields.name: display_name
keys
fields.description: The language codes in wikidata language code format.

fields.name: values
fields.description: The translated display_names in each language.
The institution's display name in different languages. Derived from the wikipedia page for the institution in the given language.

description: Translation of the display_name and description into multiple languages.

name: repositories
description: Repositories (Sources with type: repository) that have this institution as their host_organization

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID of the repository.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The repositories display name.

fields.name: host_organization
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID of the host organisation.

fields.name: host_organization_name
fields.description: The host organisations name.

fields.name: host_organization_lineage
fields.description: The host organisations lineage.

name: ror
description: The ROR ID for this institution. The ROR (Research Organization Registry) identifier is a globally unique ID for research organization. ROR is the successor to GRiD, which is no longer being updated.

name: summary_stats

fields.name: 2yr_mean_citedness
fields.description: The 2-year mean citedness for this institutions. Also known as impact factor.

fields.name: h_index
fields.description: The h-index for this institutions.

fields.name: i10_index
fields.description: The i-10 index for this institutions.

description: Citation metrics for this institutions.

name: type
description: The institution's primary type, using the ROR "type" controlled vocabulary. Possible values are: Education, Healthcare, Company, Archive, Nonprofit, Government, Facility, and Other.

name: updated_date
description: The last time anything in this Institution changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string. This date is updated for any change at all, including increases in various counts.

name: works_api_url
description: A URL that will get you a list of all the Works affiliated with this institution. We express this as an API URL (instead of just listing the Works themselves) because most institutions have way too many works to reasonably fit into a single return object.

name: works_count
description: The number of Works created by authors affiliated with this institution. Or less formally: the number of works coming out of this institution.

name: x_concepts

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The English-language label of the concept.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for this concept.

fields.name: level
fields.description: The level in the concept tree where this concept lives.

fields.name: score
fields.description: The strength of association between this institution and the listed concept, from 0-100.

fields.name: wikidata
fields.description: The Wikidata ID for this concept.

description: The "x" in x_concepts is because it's experimental and subject to removal with very little warning. We plan to replace it with a custom link to the Concepts API endpoint. The Concepts most frequently applied to works affiliated with this institution. Each is represented as a dehydrated Concept object, with one additional attribute
